Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Cicero
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Cicero due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Cicero due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include:

  • #7 Harrison
  • #54 Cicero

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
